notes: Global buff values are taken from community documentation and may be updated between URF runs.
Champion-specific damage dealt/received modifiers can apply in URF.
Values listed may change between URF runs and can be updated between events.

balance_modifiers.notes: Values and modifiers can change between URF runs; see patch/buff history for specifics.

patch_specific_changes.change: Attack speed cap increased from 2.5 to 10.0 for ARURF/URF.
patch_specific_changes.source_context: ARURF section and Attack Speed Cap system notes.

sources.name: League of Legends Wiki (Fandom) - Ultra Rapid Fire
used_for: ability haste and no mana/energy costs (main effects)

sources.name: League of Legends Wiki (Fandom) - URF Patch and Buff History
used_for: URF buff list (resource costs, haste, tenacity/tenaciousness, movement speed, attack speed multipliers, crit damage, health costs, bonus XP, mana-to-health conversions)

sources.name: League of Legends Patch 2025.S1.3 Notes
used_for: attack speed cap increase for ARURF/URF

sources.name: League of Legends Wiki - URF Map Changes Module
used_for: mode-specific balance changes for champions, items, runes, and summoner spells
